name: Captain The Runner (itch)
description:
Captain The Runner is an endless runner game based on retro graphics, where the player must avoid colliding with the cars, bus, space ships, water bodies and much more! You can play the game as long as you can and also as long as you survive. You need to keep avoiding the objects and once you collide with any one of them, the game will be over. You will be given 1000 jumping chances to avoid meeting an accident. You need to collect golden stars and also other bonuses like red star, green star, and blue star and increase your score.

Key Features:
  • 5 Custom Scenarios to play!
  • Many Cars, Planes, Space Ships and More!
  • Collect Golden Stars to increase your score!
  • High Score and Achievements!
  • Very Addictive
  • Collect Bonus Stars including Red, Green and Blue stars!
  • Jump to avoid Cars, Space Ships for about 1000 times!
  • Score Increases as long as you survive!
  • Challenging gameplay!
  • Simple and Easy Controls!
  • Game Manual for player's guide during gameplay!
Minimum System Requirements:

512MB RAM Recommended

128MB of Video memory

Compatible Sound Card

DirectX 9.0 or higher.

Contact Me:

If you face any problem please don't hesitate to contact me: http://www.amaxang-games.com/p/blog-page.html

Final Words:
Any feedback or suggestions are greatly appreciated! You can donate what you think is fair for the game if you get frustrated or addicted.
